mapper.select: SELECT user.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_follow WHERE user_follow.userid = user.userid) AS followers, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM story WHERE story.author_id = user.userid) AS story_count FROM user WHERE userid != #{userid} AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM role WHERE role.userid = user.userid AND role.role = 'user') ORDER BY (followers * 0.8 + story_count * 0.2) DESC
